backend/main.mo: Actor implementing chat messaging, action parsing, and per‑session authorization plus user‑profile storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence record linking a UI‑copy update to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files involved in chat, layout, auth, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx with a title referencing asterisk action parsing.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component showing a profile‑setup modal until a user profile exists, then rendering the chat page.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity with loading states and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatCompose: Message input box supporting Enter‑to‑send and indicating action messages ending with an asterisk.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatTranscr: Renders message history or an empty‑state prompt explaining normal and asterisk‑based action messages.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageBubb: Displays individual chat messages with role and action styling, showing Puro avatar or user badge.
Avatar component showing Puro’s image at multiple configurable sizes.
frontend/src/components/layout/ChatLayou: Page layout with header branding Puro as a chat assistant plus footer attribution and share links.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Modal prompting users to enter a display name before accessing chat, with non‑dismissible behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the user's identity, reinitializing and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useGuestSessionId.ts: Provides a stable guest session ID using localStorage or a generated fallback UUID.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity state, login/logout, and status through a React context provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profile operations and chat history/message actions, using either authenticated or guest session IDs.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind and theme variables for light and dark modes with a warm sci‑fi aesthetic.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/ChatPage.tsx: Displays chat history, handles sending messages, and manages UI states like loading and errors.
frontend/src/utils/guestSession.ts: Manages creation, retrieval, and clearing of guest session IDs using localStorage with UUID fallback.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, supporting query and hash routes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project's state, versioning, and feature list for an AI chat app with roleplay parsing, themed UI, and guest-mode access.
